text:
[Section: Page 946 of 1048]



Message 3626 of 4024
What a new start really means to you on OFW - OFW is a safe place for communication. The OFW message sent with story about ex-boyfriend killing
ex-girlfriend at her workplace was very alarming and I felt very unsafe. It was and still is very threatening and scary to me. Communications to be on
OFW and focus on issues related to the children.
Adrian’s visit tomorrow and what he should bring - Done.
Confirm that you will be sending my mail over - Done.
Discuss the mail I have addressed to both of us - Please confirm which one.
Confirm your stance on seeing kids before trip - Adrian had a visit with you today as scheduled
If you plan to stay at war with me as promised - ?
Agree on Hong Kong communication expectations - Please share what types of communications you are requesting from me and/or boys.
Agree on practical terms of Fridays agreement - Please send your proposal.
Figure out how to get camping stuff in garage - Please send your list.
Swap our thoughts on the house we both own - Please send your proposal.
If you think we have a parenting plan in place - This was a question in the Discovery package sent by your lawyer. I will review with my lawyer.
Understand your thoughts on our reunification - Jennifer has been engaged and has shared next steps.
Find out how many developer weeks we have - This was a question in the Discovery package sent by your lawyer. I will review with my lawyer.
If you plan to start applying what we are reading - I would politely ask we avoid these types of questions, as it could lead to additional conflict.
Sent:07/14/2024 at 02:56 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 07/14/2024 at 02:57 PM)
Subject:Re: Things I’d like to chat about
Message 3627 of 4024
Thanks. Look forward to chatting...
Sent:07/14/2024 at 02:58 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/14/2024 at 03:29 PM)
Subject:Re: Things I’d like to chat about
Message 3628 of 4024
Please let me know when is convenient so I can plan my day accordingly. Thanks
Sent:07/14/2024 at 03:54 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Re: Things I’d like to chat about
Message 3629 of 4024
I can’t stand (or believe) you did not realize that was an ad targeting joke. We have made those exact jokes for years. I thought you would see the
humor. I apologize from the bottom of my heart. There is no threat whatsoever. I don’t understand how you could just turn on a dime when this
time last year we were having lunches every day, sex three times a day and still had our regular date nights. This seems inconceivable. But I respect
where you are at and will not make jokes in bad taste again. Please forgive me.
Sent:07/14/2024 at 04:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Please call

Message 3630 of 4024
Let’s please close on this. I’m honestly blown away and think we need help. I don’t know how we got to this place but we need to leave it quickly.
Sent:07/14/2024 at 05:12 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/15/2024 at 05:34 AM)
Subject:Re: Please call
Message 3631 of 4024
May we please touch base tonight? I feel like we are on the cusp of communicating again. I hoped we were at a  stage where we both want to bring the
temperature down. But that’s only gonna happen if we start taking control of the situation. And that means understanding each others intent.
I am more than willing to work with you and I keep trying to show you, so I hope you know that. If we can start with better communication I am
sure we can work wonders together. I’m not going to push you, I’ll defer to the professionals and I think that should help. But nothing happens
unless we can communicate.
Please respond. I do not want to escalate. No matter what. If it’s controlling to say chat tonight, fine,
let’s do it tomorrow. When you have time. I’m not going to push and make this a test of wills when we chat. But please communicate. Without that,
nothing happens, except escalation. Please work with me.
Sent:07/14/2024 at 08:56 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/15/2024 at 05:33 AM)
Subject:Touch Base
Message 3632 of 4024
What a new start really means to you on OFW - OFW is a safe place for communication. The OFW message sent with story about ex-boyfriend killing
ex-girlfriend at her workplace was very alarming and I felt very unsafe. It was and still is very threatening and scary to me. Communications to be on
OFW and focus on issues related to the children. <<Sound good and I agree. But please note that my mail was clearly an attempt to make peace. This
was in no way a threat. I actually said: "Wanna try again? I really would like to touch base briefly off this horrible, no good, awful platform and find
some common ground. " It was sent in a playful way, referencing an ongoing joke we have had and it says specifically that I am extending an olive
branch to heal.. Adrian’s visit tomorrow and what he should bring - Done. <<Thanks. Super helpful>>
Confirm that you will be sending my mail over - Done. <<I did not get the mail I needed. I had asked separately if you have checked the mail lately.
Please advise. It is important. >>
Discuss the mail I have addressed to both of us - Please confirm which one. <<Not worth the back and forth. I'm going to open>>
Confirm your stance on seeing kids before trip - Adrian had a visit with you today as scheduled <<I'd like to consider the plan Lisa sent that was
created with a child therapist that is at least a little closer to Dr Brown's advice. I will resend it again through the attorneys>>
If you plan to stay at war with me as promised - ?
Agree on Hong Kong communication expectations - Please share what types of communications you are requesting from me and/or boys. <<I sent
this through the attorney. I will send it again if you won't talk to me and just agree. I trust you and would instead hope we just agree. I'm not going to
bother you, I need a reliable way to get in touch with you and the kids>>
Agree on practical terms of Fridays agreement - Please send your proposal. <<It is your plan. I just want to put some process around it.>>
Figure out how to get camping stuff in garage - Please send your list. <<Thermarest is the most urgent. That is what I really need ASAP. Not the Kids,
mine. Thanks>>
Swap our thoughts on the house we both own - Please send your proposal. <<This is not an OFW email. It's a $3m decision that we need to swap
ideas based on goals. I'll consider this blocked>>
Sent:07/15/2024 at 07:55 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/15/2024 at 01:26 PM)
Subject:Re: Things I’d like to chat about

If you think we have a parenting plan in place - This was a question in the Discovery package sent by your lawyer. I will review with my lawyer.
<<Thanks>>
Understand your thoughts on our reunification - Jennifer has been engaged and has shared next steps. <<That is the schedule not how you feel>>
Find out how many developer weeks we have - This was a question in the Discovery package sent by your lawyer. I will review with my lawyer.
<<Thanks>>
If you plan to start applying what we are reading - I would politely ask we avoid these types of questions, as it could lead to additional conflict.
<<What would you propose? Jennifer gave us books to read as homework. It's fair to ask if you plan to start applying best practices>>
Message 3633 of 4024
Christine
I sent some notes in an email with ideas for halving up Fidelity, but I am going to need cash or a way to get money prior to you leaving. I can sell 100k
before you go and move 50k to wherever you want. But I need money now, and if you are dark, I am going to have to go ahead with that. So please
consider this a formal request to work with you in a way that is consistent with our court order. I hope that on something as simple as this, you will
cooperate as agreed.
thanks,
robert

I apologize again. Love you like crazy, would never hurt a hair on your body and still want to

I just finished one of the books again. I am not looking to point fingers. I want to apologize for my role in anything that made you anxious or gave you
distress. I mean that from the bottom of my heart.
Sent:07/15/2024 at 03:50 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/15/2024 at 07:07 PM)
Subject:Peace | Peace | Peace

If you can suggest a way for us to get through some of our shared things in a reasonable amount of time so we can get you off to Hong Kong with/
little to no anxiety, I am totally on board. Let's please do this!
And that does NOT mean, "Yeah... but here are all the things you did wrong." It means that we look forward and stop scoreboarding like Dr. Brown
told us to do on behalf of the lids months ago. Can we try?
You make the rules. I am all in.

Can you use OFW for communication please.
I still see multiple emails.
For Adrian, I noted your email communication in regards to his telephone call.
I’m not comfortable sharing my thoughts with you as it does not feel safe for me.
Either way, our interpretation is just that, our POV.
As Adrian is speaking with both Kari and Jennifer, they are in a good position to determine his perspectives, separate from how you or I may view or
communicate a situation.
On a positive note, we have witnessed Adrian become increasingly more comfortable verbalizing how he feels, and addressing a situation
independently. I have noticed a marked change this year in his communication style and confidence. I am very proud of him.

Message 3659 of 4024
I have shared that OFW and other forms of communications with you have become an unsafe space for me where I feel attacked and threatened,
causing great anxiety and fear. It is real for me.
Example: I received in one day, two very direct OFWs, one attaching an article that discusses an ex boyfriend killing his ex girlfriend at her work place,
stating how the recommended targeting was scary personal for you, and another “expressing concern” for my well being.
This is causing me great distress, they are alarming, I feel unsafe, threatened, anxious, and scared.
Below feels like another attempt to bully and shame me, disregarding my multiple communications to you, since you sent those specific ones
referenced, on the direct impact what you have sent has had to me. This is scary to me. I cry when I think about it and hyperventilate. I feel attacked.
I have on multiple occasions expressed your communications feel unsafe and bullying and abusive and am doing so again.
It must stop.
Sent:07/15/2024 at 07:49 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 07/15/2024 at 07:49 PM)
Subject:OFW communications... unsafe to me.
Attachments:IMG_0651_1.JPG (737 KB)
Message 3660 of 4024
You keep noting the poor joke about targeting but leave out what I wrote in my own hand:
"Wanna try again? I really would like to touch base briefly off this horrible, no good, awful platform and find some common ground.   "
Everything is selective interpretation with you and a reason not to partner on anything.
If you do not feel safe, I will accept that and will not exacerbate that. And I am sorry you feel that way. Please let me know if there is anything I can
do. I want nothing but the best for you.
Sent:07/15/2024 at 08:04 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/16/2024 at 07:26 AM)
Subject:Re: OFW communications... unsafe to me.
Message 3661 of 4024
Trying my best to make progress here but your mental health comes first. I will need to move forward if you are not able to partner. Please let me
know about the things below that I need from you. I have been trying to solve these issues and the others that we had to mediate for a long time now.
I have trimmed the list back considerably so we can focus better. Hope it helps.
Confirm that you will be sending my mail over <<I really need the mail you did not send before you go. Please advise. It is time-sensitive>>
Agree on Hong Kong communication expectations <<Please advise. This one is important to me. I don't want a fight. They are my kids too>>
Sent:07/15/2024 at 08:20 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/16/2024 at 07:26 AM)
Subject:Re: Things I’d like to chat about

here on anything else.>>
Figure out how to get camping stuff in garage  <<I have let you know I need my thermarest and yellow backpack as you asked>>
Confirm your stance on seeing kids before trip <<You refuse to let me see my kids. This is in sharp contrast to the books we have>>
Discuss the mail I have addressed to both of us <<I'm opening it myself>>
Swap our thoughts on the house we both own <<Not now>>
If you think we have a parenting plan in place  <<Not now>>
Understand your thoughts on our reunification   <<Not now>>
Find out how many developer weeks we have   <<Not now>>
If you plan to start applying what we are reading  <<Not now>>

So did you talk to Adrian about this at all? I’m trying to understand the chain of events and why that happens when he goes home to you. It’s all too
weird. I know my son, well. And this is usually instigated.

Tyring to bring the temperature down and hoping to work with you.
All none child related issues need to go through lawyers as outlined in OFW.
<<Please share this agreed-upon outline you are talking about. I am unaware of OFW as the rulebook and recall we had discussed Rosen and
mediation at great length last week so this feels new and made up. Even yesterday, we spent a great deal of time in a two-way discussion about selling
AMD to which you agreed. >>
I do not take your threats of unilateral decisions lightly.
<<Of course this is thick with irony. After unilaterally taking everything in my life, I'll defer comments that may escalate things. I am not making
decisions unilaterally. You are refusing to give me my mail, the things you asked to have identified from the garage or make progress on the legal
agreement, which I have offered to share a plan on several times. Of course, you said to detail here in OFW several times, but today you say above, I
am not allowed to share here. We are dead in the water with contradictions and obstructions>>
HK. I have repeatedly asked you to share your proposed plans.
<<You have my plans. I sent them weeks ago through the lawyers. Please ask Natalie if she has not shared them with you. They came through the
lawyers, as you requested. Please respond accordingly rather than continue to stall. This has been going on for weeks now.>>
Seeing kids before hk. No change to our agreement. Adrian had his supervised visit.
<<This feels like a unilateral decision I should not take lightly>>
Friday decision. Details need to go through lawyers. I need money too. No unilateral decisions on how much money you take from stock sale. I do not
agree.
<<We already funded 35k for July you have been spending. None of this went through lawyers. You get 100% of your paycheck. You have money>>
All other issues. Go through lawyers.
<<When did you make this unilateral decision, today?>>

curricular activities. just lmk.
Btw- I noticed you still have personal charges running through the jt BofA account. I saw AT&T, rocket money, comcast, Safeway, your cares
